Name: Living Legends: The Blue Chamber Collector's Edition
About the game: Friendly Fox – F.F.S. brings you a startling new tale of magic, mystery, and murder in Living Legends: The Blue Chamber! Alex has come to Bird’s Nest Castle to visit his sister but arrives to find her missing and her husband under attack by a painting come to life, and that’s just the beginning! Help Alex solve the castle’s puzzles and challenges as he races to learn the truth behind the castle’s dark past and rumors of a curse that plagues it to this day! You’ll need all your searching skills and puzzling prowess to unravel the mystery and save Alex’s sister in this fantastic new Hidden-Object Puzzle Adventure game! This is a special Collector's Edition release full of exclusive extras you won’t find in the standard version. The Collector’s Edition includes: • Help the famous artist, Katrina, break the terrifying curse cast by magical paints on her son, Christian! • Collect morphing objects and enchanted birds in every scene! Play the bonus puzzle in Extras! • Enjoy wallpapers, screensavers, and music tracks from the game! Save one of each for later! • Never get lost with the strategy guide!
